body.description: Simplistic in detail and ready for the job, this easy-to-coordinate changing table has a strong and sturdy wood construction, and comes in several popular finishes. It features clean lines and a fully enclosed dressing area for extra security. Two spacious open shelves are ideal for all the diapers, wipes, creams and toys you'll need to get through all those changes. A changing pad is included. Assembly is required. Do not spray cleaners directly onto furniture

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Delta Children Delta Children was founded around the idea of making safe, high-quality cribs affordable for all families. Today, we’re one of the largest family-owned company in the juvenile products industry, and trusted by millions of families worldwide. We design and manufacture a wide range of furniture products for the early childhood years-and beyond, providing children with safe places to sleep, play and explore. Infant Changing Table From Delta Children Change or dress your baby in absolute comfort with this Infant Changing Table from Delta Children. Strong & sturdy wood construction Includes water-resistant changing pad with safety strap Includes two fixed shelves for open storage Safety rails enclose all four sides around the top of the table Made of solid wood and wood composites Easy assembly Assembled dimensions: 35"(W) x 39.25"(H) x 19.75"(D) | Shelf Height: 10"H

Features Classic Design A timeless bell-shaped headboard adds instant style to any nursery. Plenty of Storage Two shelves allow you to store all your child's changing and dressing necessities nearby. Includes Changing Pad The included changing pad is water-resistant and features an attached safety strap for additional security.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best thing bought this time.
reviews.reviewText: Very beautiful and spacious. Sturdy and good price. Definitely 5 stars. Easy to assemble. Looks exactly like the picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is easy to assemble, the color is pretty and the size is right, I consider it a very good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Save your back
reviews.reviewText: Before we got this we were changing our baby on our bed (king size pretty tall) but still would get terrible back pains for constant bending over. This was a great investment and doesn’t take up too much space. I appreciate the storage space, I keep his diaper changing supplies, extra onesies, and my pumping supplies all within reach. It is sturdy and was easy to assemble. Wipeable with wipes for those messy diaper changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, simple, sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: Let me start by saying I put this together myself, I'm almost 9 months pregnant.It was easy to put together. In the instructions it says you need needle nose pliers but I don't see why. Never needed them, everything is put together with an allen wrench which is provided.It's very solid. Doesn't wiggle around, but light enough you can move it by yourself for positioning purposes.The changing pad it comes with isn't super thick, however that doesn't mean it's thin. It's made so the rails are much higher than the pad. It's actually surprisingly plush and I would use it if I didn't already have a curved one. I loved the curved changing pad from my 1st so I'm going to use it again.I'll probably use the pad it came with for downstairs in my home as a 2nd area for changes.TLDR:quality item at a good price. Can't go wrong with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to assemble and is nice and sturdy and very easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong chemical smell
reviews.reviewText: The changing table had a strong chemical smell. Considering it is a baby product would be nice to use a low VOC paint. Luckily I bought it early and still have time for it to air out.The construction is pretty decent. The construction instructions they kind of throw at you all in the first step. But it’s an easy build if you built this type of furniture before. I kind of wish there were caps to hide the bolts. And there were two barrel nuts in the back that stick out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not cheap like some products. Solidly built. Looks good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Purchase Ever!!
reviews.reviewText: We went without a changing table with our first due to lack of space and always just changed her on our dresser. When I got pregnant a second time I wanted our babies to have separate spaces to be changed, so I splurged a bit and got this. Best decision I’ve made! It’s got so much more space than our dresser and has been helpful in keeping our first from gator rolling on our dresser, as she really can’t do that on here. The product seems very sturdy and well-made and we’re super excited to get the matching crib to complete the new nursery set!
It was pretty easy to build, I only had my 9 year old niece helping me and we managed. It seems to be very sturdy and well made.

reviews.reviewTitle: Producto que supera su precio, super recomendable
reviews.reviewText: Este cambiador es muy barato, esperaba algo de menor calidad por el precio que pague, sin embargo me llevé una grata sorpresa, la calidad de la madera es buena, y ya ensamblado luce muy bien, estable y seguro.El producto se entrega en piezas, es muy sencillo de ensamblar y lo mejor de todo es que no se necesitan herramientas especiales para hacerlo, todo se ensambla con una llave que viene incluida en el paquete, y todas las piezas necesarias vienen incluidas también.~Actualización y recomendación:Sigo pensando que el producto es bueno y por el precio estoy contento, pero ahora que mi bebé empieza a caminar me doy cuenta que hubiera sido mejor comprar un cambiador que no tuviera los compartimientos abiertos ya que a los bebés les encanta sacar y aventar todo lo que guardas.

HICE MUY BUENA COMPRA CON ESTA CAMBIADOR, LA MADERA ES DE EXCELENTE CALIDAD, FACIL ENSAMBLE, LLEGO MUY BIEN EMPAQUETADO, EL PRECIO SUPER ACCESIBLE, MUY CONTENTA CON ESTA COMPRA , LLEGO ANTES DEL TIEMPO ESTIPULADO,LO RECOMIENDO AMPLIAMENTE.
The product was off-gassing a very strong chemical smell. Would not recommend for children and pregnant moms.

Great changing table for little one. There indeed was a strong scent, however 5 months later and it has faded. Still love this table. Comes with a thing changing pad but just enough for little one to be comfortable. Great storage room underneath
